A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just a hot mess. From cringey lines to shoddy editing and scenes that seem to be ripped straight from Empire\, the film relies on its high self-regard and fandom to carry it through. Barely watchable. Some nice visual work in the battle shots but otherwise a very recycled and tired soapbox of disney-esq social commentary projected onto the corpse of the original trilogy.
